long_description: A delightful combination of comfort and compact portability, the ErgoBaby Stowaway baby carrier folds into its own front pouch for easy storage in your car, closet or stroller. ErgoBaby disperses baby's weight between the hips and thighs, helping eliminate compression of the spine; weight is comfortably balanced to the parent's hips and shoulders. Padded shoulder straps and waist belt can be configured to carry baby in front, back or on your hip. Machine-washable ErgoBaby cradles your child in a natural sitting position; comfy sleeping hood adjusts to keep up with baby's growth. The ErgoBaby Stowaway baby carrier features a wrist strap for easy carrying when it's folded into the storage pouch.
